boardgame.description: Alcatraz: The Scapegoat is a game about conflicted loyalties. On one hand, the players work together to bust out of the famous prison; on the other hand they all know that one of them will be left behind as the scapegoat._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Alcatraz is a peculiar game because while it is cooperative in some aspects, with players needing to work together to complete tasks, the game has loads of negative interaction as one player will always be the scapegoat. You don't want to be that guy. You don't _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;go all in,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; you don't always keep your promises, and you don't do _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;what's best for the group._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; Instead, you do everything you can to become indispensable, and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;everything_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; is literal here _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; even if it means stealing from, betraying, and blackmailing other players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In order to escape from Alcatraz, the players need to complete six parts of a plan. Each part is a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;pick-up and deliver_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; task requiring specific items obtained in different parts of the prison. Once each part of the plan is completed, every player but the scapegoat moves a little closer to escaping, with the scapegoat being voted on each round by all the players _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; most likely the player who contributed the least to completing that particular task, but you never know. Thus, you could say that Alcatraz is a cooperative game _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; but with a twist._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The map of the prison constituting the play area is generated randomly each game, providing high replayability. Alcatraz is designed for 3-4 players, and due to its theme and complex gameplay is best suited for mature players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Ku?nia Gier (KZG 001) Alcatraz – the infamous Rock, a well-known American top-security prison. It is said that no one has ever escaped from there. But it’s not really true… “Alcatraz: the Scapegoat” is a cooperative game for 3-4 players which features an innovative “scapegoat” mechanism. The players cooperate in order to escape from the legendary prison, but they also know that, one person has to stay on the island as the eponymous scapegoat.
Reserved for william4192 who won it in my auction. Played Once

This game includes the original instructions in Polish and English. I am selling this game in order to make room on my shelves for games that might get played more often. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m pricing it to move because I care more about getting it out of my home than I do about turning a profit. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve added a good bit of value, too! Read on for more. Condition --- The box and all game components are in perfect condition. The insert is slightly banged up and torn, damage which I believe occurred during manufacturing, since the insert looked a little crushed when I first opened the box, but there is absolutely no evidence of shipping mishaps, and no other parts are damaged. Components --- All game components and manuals are present and in perfectly pristine condition. Furthermore, the following extras are included: -A plano box holding all of the tokens. -Cards protected in Mayday premium sleeves. -Cards bound into a deck using non-adhesive Amazing Tape. Shipping --- I will ship this via USPS in a flat rate box (I think it will fit), to the USA only for $15 (bringing the order total to $25). If you are outside of the US and really want this game, feel free to drop me a GM, and we can discuss it. I only hesitate because I rarely ship out of the country. Free pickup is available if you happen to be in Albuquerque, NM. Payment --- I accept payment through Paypal only. Please do not send payment to my personal email address (the one listed when you make the purchase). I will provide a Paypal address to use when I confirm the sale.
